alert.note: Alert for Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 06 at 1:24AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...SNOW CAUSING SLICK TRAVEL FROM VAIL UP TO AND OVER VAIL PASS THIS MORNING... CDOT traffic cameras revealed snow was covering a portion of I-70 from Vail eastward to Vail Pass early this morning. Snow will continue to impact this section of the interstate at times through the morning hours on Sunday before gradually letting up during the afternoon. If traveling through Vail and up and over Vail Pass, be prepared for winter driving conditions and slick, slow- moving travel at times. Give yourself plenty of extra time and use extreme caution while driving to ensure you arrive at your destination safely.

area.areaDesc: Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
